verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> ye the LORD <S%H3050><s%>. Praise <S%H1984><s%> God <S%H410><s%> in his sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>: praise <S%H1984><s%> him in the firmament <S%H7549><s%> of his power <S%H5797><s%>. Praise ye: Heb. Hallelujah
Praise <S%H1984><s%> him for his mighty acts <S%H1369><s%>: praise <S%H1984><s%> him according to his excellent <S%H7230><s%> greatness <S%H1433><s%>.
Praise <S%H1984><s%> him with the sound <S%H8629><s%> of the trumpet <S%H7782><s%>: praise <S%H1984><s%> him with the psaltery <S%H5035><s%> and harp <S%H3658><s%>. trumpet: or, cornet
Praise <S%H1984><s%> him with the timbrel <S%H8596><s%> and dance <S%H4234><s%>: praise <S%H1984><s%> him with stringed instruments <S%H4482><s%> and organs <S%H5748><s%>. dance: or, pipe
Praise <S%H1984><s%> him upon the loud <S%H8088><s%> cymbals <S%H6767><s%>: praise <S%H1984><s%> him upon the high sounding <S%H8643><s%> cymbals <S%H6767><s%>.
Let every thing that hath breath <S%H5397><s%> praise <S%H1984><s%> the LORD <S%H3050><s%>. Praise <S%H1984><s%> ye the LORD <S%H3050><s%>.
